Description: A ruined house; a tall building, with ancient foundations and walls, a tree beside it at far l Pen and brown ink, with brown wash
Bibliographic references: Hind 1915-31 / Catalogue of Dutch and Flemish Drawings preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (12)
Exhibition history: 2004-2005 Oct-Jan, Birmingham, Barber Inst of Fine Arts, 'Bartolomeus Breenbergh 'Joseph in Egypt'
